title: The biodiversity gain plan: draft template and guidance

content.text: Calling all developers and local authorities: following testing with stakeholders, we are pleased to share the draft biodiversity gain plan template, alongside guidance and information on the biodiversity gain plan.

Please note, this is a draft biodiversity gain plan template and draft guidance which is subject to change. We will let you know of any changes via this blog and will publish the final biodiversity gain plan template before BNG becomes mandatory.
